name: Clarity Coverdale Fury
tagline: We believe in the behavioral change for the good.
description:
Clarity Coverdale Fury is a Minneapolis-based advertising agency that specializes in feeding the emotional connection between brands and people through digital marketing, brand development, advertising, promotions and public relations. They consistently produce results often doubling or tripling a brand's historical performance. Their tools include brilliant strategic thinking and world-class creativity.
This focus on feeding the connection has received national and international recognition by creating some of the most effective and innovative approaches in the industry. In 2010, Clarity Coverdale Fury was one of the three finalists recognized by the American Association of Advertising Agencies for Small Agency of the Year and for the third consecutive year, won the Web Marketing Association's WebAward for "Best Advocacy Website."â€‹ Clarity Coverdale Fury is perhaps best known for creating the global launch of Belvedere Vodka which shot from $0-$1 billion in sales in just nine years. Current brands in the agency's portfolio include: Chopin Vodka, Wings Financial, ClearWay Minnesota, International Dairy Queen, BMS Group, Park Nicollet, Metro Transit, Minnesota Zoo and Red Gold Tomatoes among others. Clarity Coverdale Fury actively blogs on the subject of Conscious Consumers.
